resources.string: where all your dreams come true! (some restrictions apply)
take a look at our VERY real and VERY safe variety of attractions that guaruntee full fun for the family!
Enter the magical world of Harry Potter with fake dragons and lots of little kids with wands. Also the price of the costume is more than the ticket.
We think. We actually don\'t know. But it has a ship. So expect pirates and a missing wallet.
Take a stroll through Cinderellah\'s castle which has been always um yellow by the way.
Explore the center of fame through Gollywood by meeting all your favorite actors that are just pretending to be your favorite actors! Also that doesn\'t say Hollywood haha..
I do not want to stay in a hotel
